mapper.select: select BRANCH_NO, BRANCH_NAME, BRANCH_MEMBER_NAME from BRANCH where BRANCH_NO=(select BRANCH_NO from MANAGER where MANAGER_ID=#{manager_id})
select CAR_KIND.*, CAR.* from CAR_KIND, CAR where CAR_KIND.CAR_NO=CAR.CAR_NO and BRANCH_NO=(select BRANCH_NO from MANAGER where MANAGER_ID=#{manager_id})

select CAR_KIND.*, CAR.* from CAR_KIND, CAR where CAR_KIND.CAR_NO=CAR.CAR_NO and BRANCH_NO=(select BRANCH_NO from MANAGER where MANAGER_ID=#{manager_id}) and CAR_KIND_NO!=(select CAR_KIND_NO from INSURANCE where INSURANCE_NO =#{insurance_no})
select BRANCH_NO from INSURANCE where INSURANCE_WITHDRAW_AT='N' and BRANCH_NO=(select BRANCH_NO from MANAGER where MANAGER_ID=#{manager_id})

select * from INSURANCE, CAR, BRANCH where INSURANCE.INSURANCE_WITHDRAW_AT='N' and INSURANCE.BRANCH_NO=(select BRANCH_NO from MANAGER where MANAGER_ID=#{manager_id}) and CAR.CAR_NO = INSURANCE.CAR_NO and BRANCH.BRANCH_NO = INSURANCE.BRANCH_NO
select * from INSURANCE, CAR, BRANCH where INSURANCE_WITHDRAW_AT='N' and CAR.CAR_NO = INSURANCE.CAR_NO and BRANCH.BRANCH_NO = INSURANCE.BRANCH_NO
select * from INSURANCE, CAR, BRANCH where INSURANCE_NO=#{insurance_no} and CAR.CAR_NO = INSURANCE.CAR_NO and BRANCH.BRANCH_NO = INSURANCE.BRANCH_NO
mapper.insert: insert into INSURANCE values(INSURANCE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{branch_no}, #{car_kind_no}, (select CAR.CAR_NO from CAR_KIND, CAR where CAR_KIND.CAR_NO=CAR.CAR_NO and BRANCH_NO=#{branch_no} and CAR_KIND_NO=#{car_kind_no}), #{insurance_price}, #{insurance_name}, #{insurance_limit}, #{insurance_burden_price}, #{insurance_limit_age}, #{insurance_limit_carrier}, 'N', SYSDATE)
mapper.select: select BRANCH.*, INSURANCE.*, CAR.*, CAR_KIND.* from BRANCH, INSURANCE, CAR, CAR_KIND where INSURANCE.INSURANCE_NO=#{insurance_no} and INSURANCE.CAR_KIND_NO = CAR_KIND.CAR_KIND_NO and CAR_KIND.CAR_NO = CAR.CAR_NO and BRANCH.BRANCH_NO = INSURANCE.BRANCH_NO
mapper.update: update INSURANCE set BRANCH_NO=#{branch_no}, CAR_KIND_NO=#{car_kind_no}, CAR_NO= (select CAR.CAR_NO from CAR_KIND, CAR where CAR_KIND.CAR_NO=CAR.CAR_NO and BRANCH_NO=(select BRANCH_NO from MANAGER where MANAGER_ID=#{manager_id}) and CAR_KIND_NO=#{car_kind_no}), INSURANCE_PRICE=#{insurance_price}, INSURANCE_NAME=#{insurance_name}, INSURANCE_LIMIT=#{insurance_limit}, INSURANCE_BURDEN_PRICE=#{insurance_burden_price}, INSURANCE_LIMIT_AGE=#{insurance_limit_age}, INSURANCE_LIMIT_CARRIER=#{insurance_limit_carrier}, INSURANCE_WITHDRAW_AT='N', INSURANCE_RESIST=SYSDATE where INSURANCE_NO=#{insurance_no}
update INSURANCE set INSURANCE_WITHDRAW_AT='Y' where INSURANCE_NO=#{insurance_no}
mapper.select: select * from BRANCH where BRANCH_WITHDRAW_AT='N' and BRANCH_NO!=(select BRANCH_NO from MANAGER where MANAGER_ID=#{manager_id})
select * from BRANCH where BRANCH_WITHDRAW_AT='N' and BRANCH_NO!=#{branch_no}
select CAR_KIND.*, CAR.* from CAR_KIND , CAR where BRANCH_NO=#{branch_no} and CAR_KIND.CAR_NO = CAR.CAR_NO
select BRANCH_NO from MANAGER where MANAGER_ID=#{manager_id}
